p: Viral RNA was extracted from 140 μl of culture supernatant using QIAmp viral RNA Mini kits (Qiagen), according to the manufacturer’s instructions. cDNA was synthesized from extracted RNA using SuperScript III First-Strand Synthesis System for RT-PCR (Invitrogen) as per the manufacturer’s instructions. DENV serotype was identified by RT-PCR using serotype-specific primers [ 5], and the LongRange PCR Kit (Qiagen) (thermocycling conditions are available on request).
